nodes.text: The Galactic Senate of the New Republic had a Senate hangar decades after the Battle of Endor on the planet Hosnian Prime. Representatives parked their starships there, and the Precision air team was stationed in the hangar as well.
30 years after the Battle of Endor, the Hosnian system was totally obliterated by Starkiller Base.
The Senate hangar first appeared in the 2016 canon novel Bloodline by Claudia Gray.
